Restaurant 9 Reinas is the best Argentinian steak restaurant in Barcelona.  It's located in the upscale commercial (shopping) and entertainment district of Barcelona.  With a chic, modern and sleek interior that is very cool, romantic and intimate with tables and booths on multiple levels.  The grilled vegetables and steak are delicious.  The vibe and energy are great.  For meat lovers, this restaurant is a necessity.
